original_text: It was the 30th year. God spoke to me on the fifth day of the fourth month. I was among the prisoners from Judah at the side of the Kebar river. At that time the skies opened and I saw visions from God.
korean_text: 서른째 해 넷째 달 초닷새에 내가 그발 강 가 사로잡힌 자 중에 있을 때에 하늘이 열리며 하나님의 모습이 내게 보이니

sentences.original_text: on the fifth day of the fourth month
I was among the prisoners from Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 유다에서 온 포로들 중에 있었다

sentences.original_text: at the side of the Kebar river
At that time the skies opened
and I saw visions from God
